cgcloud__Promotion_Hurdle_Expression__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Hurdle_Expression__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Hurdle_Expression__c.description: New object that stores the information about an expression.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Allows_Classification__c.description: Indicates whether the expression function can dynamically consider the classification and the KAM is able to filter products according to the classification at Promotion Hurdle level.

cgcloud__Expression_Function__c.description: Name of the function that's called to determine the value of the Expression. This function must be defined in the Mobility Modeler as a Javascript function. It receives a predefined list of parameters as input and returns a numeric value.

cgcloud__Expression_Result_Type__c.description: Type of result of the expression (Text, Numeric, Boolean).

cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c.description: Optional parameter. The question to be answered or verified.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Optional parameter. The product that's to be verified from a survey.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the promotion expression belongs.
